TestDescription.name: User credentials are sent in clear text
TestDescription.Description: User credentials are transmitted over an unencrypted channel. This information should always be transferred via an encrypted channel (HTTPS) to avoid being intercepted by malicious users.
TestDescription.Impact: A third party may be able to read the user credentials by intercepting an unencrypted HTTP connection.
TestDescription.Recommendation: Because user credentials are considered sensitive information, should always be transferred to the server over an encrypted connection (HTTPS).
